content: I think I'll take a closer look at the hay and check its moisture content, texture, and smell. I'll also ask the supplier about the type of hay, maturity, and any additives. If I'm still unsure, I might consider sending a sample to a lab for analysis. Thanks for the tips! By the way, do you have any advice on how to introduce the new hay to Starlight, Bessie, and the other horses to prevent any digestive upset?
